TransactionStateContext.PyramidState: Participants join the pyramid by sending Ether to the contract, which adds them to the participants array.
TransactionStateContext.FeeCollectionState: The contract accumulates fees from transactions, which the creator can collect.

ExternalInteractions.EtherTransfers: Ether transfers occur when participants send Ether to the contract to join the pyramid and during payouts.
ExternalInteractions.FeeTransfers: The creator can withdraw collected fees.
